name: Don´t Be A Fried
description:
Don´t Be A Fried: little game made for the Godot Jam

Objective: Avoid you and your friends be fried ;-)

Controls:
Arrows = Direction
Arrows + Space Bar = Dash

Graphics: Made by my best friend Er Tweetytuo in a few hours
Music: It's a original theme that i composed four or five years ago
Sounds FX: Made with Bfxr for Mac

Developed in a Mac Book Pro of 2011 ( WebGL 2 not available :-(  )

Binaries only tested in Mac and Windows 10

That's my first project in Godot,  my first JAM and my first game !

I'm sorry for my English ;-)
